title: Park Lane Villas - Coming Soon
posting_body: We have a Fantastic Fitness Center, 24 hours available for our residents!
Park Lane Villas has 2 and 3 bedroom apartments, both ground floor and townhouse style floor plans.
We are conveniently located near Hwy 12 and 101 so you can easily get to wherever you need to go.
Close to the malls in Santa Rosa as well as The Barlow in Sebastopol.
Easy access to SSU and SRJC, as well as Kaiser Permanente and Sutter Hospital.
Near popular restaurants and award winning wineries.
*Patio or balcony off the living room and some bedrooms
For your safety our residents and staff practice social distancing guidelines and masking.
